price: (Ànábì) Nūh tún sọ pé: “Olúwa mi, má ṣe fi ẹnì kan kan nínú àwọn aláìgbàgbọ́ sílẹ̀ lórí ilẹ̀.
arabic: وَقَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرۡ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waqāla nūḥun rabbi lā tadhar ʿalā al-arḍi mina al-kāfirīna dayyāran
